title: [CY] Upload additional evidence
description: [CY] You can upload letters, documents or photos. For example, you could take a picture of a letter from your doctor using your phone. Place it on a flat surface and take the photo from above.
noItemsMessage: [CY] You have not uploaded any files. Upload at least one file before you continue. Click 'back' if you do not want to upload anything.
noItemsError: [CY] You have not uploaded any files. Upload at least one file before you continue. Click 'back' if you do not want to upload anything.

error.maxFileSizeExceeded: [CY] The file you have uploaded is too big. Please upload a file under 5MB.
error.wrongFileType: [CY] The type of file you have uploaded is not accepted. Please convert it to a common file format and try again.
error.required: [CY] You have not uploaded a file. Please upload your file again.
error.technical: [CY] Your file could not be uploaded due to a technical error. Please try again.
error.totalFileSizeExceeded: [CY] You can only upload a maximum of 5mb of evidence. Please print and send the rest by post. The address will be sent to you after you have submitted your appeal.
